snippet.title: 24 Solar Term TGS2021 Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1569810/24_Solar_Terms/
Available in 2022 on Steam
This is a puzzle-finding game designed based on the traditional Chinese 24 solar terms. The game connects the climate and farming of various solar terms through farming proverbs, myths and fables. Help local farmers solve problems and experience the story.
